instructions: Make sure that your phone or tablet is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your speaker or display. Open a Chromecast-enabled app. Tap the Cast button . Tap the speaker or display for which you'd like to cast. When you're connected, the Cast button will turn from light to dark grey, letting you know that you're connected. You can now cast audio and video to Google Home from your device. at the top of your device. Tap Stop Casting in the box that appears.
